synopsis: A chance encounter draws high-school student Yumi, to the richly spoke of Yamayuri Council, the student government at the Lillian Girls' Academy.
Yumi continues to mull over the possibility of becoming Sachiko's soeur, but remains unconvinced.
The dress rehearsals for Cinderella are beginning and the student body president of Lillian's "brother school," Suguru, is playing the part of the prince.
Yoshino and Rei have been cousins longer than they have been soeurs, but Yoshino's health condition has been slowly putting a strain on their relationship.
The disagreement between Yoshino and Rei has reached the point that they have officially separated.
Preparations are being made to elect council leaders for next year, and a girl referring to herself as "Rosa Canina" is a proving to be strong contender to become the White Rose.
Members of the school newspaper petition the Yamayuri Council to organize a Valentine's Day scavenger hunt.
